mru.game.view

Class AppMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • mru.game.view.AppMenu

  • public class AppMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the menu and game board print methods
    Author:
    Justin Savenko, Austin Thieu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.Scanner scan
      This class will be used to show the menus and sub menus to the user It also prompts the user for the inputs and validates them

      AppMenu() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void betError()
      Prints if the user selects a wrong option on who to bet on
      void betFooter()
      Prints the footer to contain the player win or lost message to complete a box

      Prints the header for if player won or lost
      char betWho()
      This menu prompts the users on who he wishes to bet on, then returns the character which the user entered.

      Prints whenever we want to know if user wishes to continue after receiving the info provided

      Prints if the player tries to bet a amount larger than his score

      Prints if the user selects an invalid option in the main menu

      Prints when the players score hits 0

      Prints if only banker has a third card

      Prints when the Punto Banco game is over to ask if player wishes to play again

      Prints if the player lost in punto banco

      Prints if the user searches for a player that is not in the database

        option The option which the user has entered

        The sub menu which the user prompts the user to select a choice, then returns the character which the user entered.
        Returns:
        option The option which the user has entered

        public char betWho()
        This menu prompts the users on who he wishes to bet on, then returns the character which the user entered.
        Returns:
        selection The selection which the user has entered.

        Returns:

      • printTop

        public void printTop(java.util.ArrayList<Player> topPlayers)
        A method to print everyone in the ArrayList that has the most amount of wins when user inputs option (T)
        Parameters:
        topPlayers - A ArrayList of everyone that has the most amount of wins in the whole player database

      • printBoardHeader

        public void printBoardHeader()

      • printTwo

        public void printTwo(Card playerCardOne,
                     Card bankerCardOne,
                     Card playerCardTwo,
                     Card bankerCardTwo)
        Prints the first two cards for Punto Banco following game board layout
        Parameters:
        playerCardOne - the first card the player received
        bankerCardOne - the first card the banker received
        playerCardTwo - the second card the player received
        bankerCardTwo - the second card the banker received

      • noThird

        public void noThird(int player,
                    int banker)
        Prints if no third card was given to the players
        Parameters:
        player - the modulo value of the sum of cards the player received
        banker - the modulo value of the sum of cards the banker received

      • noThirdBanker

        public void noThirdBanker(Card playerCardThree,
                          int player,
                          int banker)
        Prints if player has a third card and banker does not
        Parameters:
        playerCardThree - the third card the player receives
        player - the modulo value of the sum of cards player received
        banker - the modulo value of the sum of cards banker received

      • thirdCard

        public void thirdCard(Card playerCardThree,
                      Card bankerCardThree,
                      int player,
                      int banker)
        Prints if player and banker both have a third card
        Parameters:
        playerCardThree - the third card the player receives
        bankerCardThree - the third card the banker receives
        player - the modulo value of the sum of cards player received
        banker - the modulo value of the sum of cards banker received

      • noThirdPlayer

        Parameters:
        bankerCardThree - the third card the banker receives
        player - the modulo value of the sum of cards player received
        banker - the modulo value of the sum of cards banker received
